name: The Grey House Prototype
description:
The game is called "The Grey House" and follows the story of a girl named Lady Grey and her demise. This is a prototype at the moment to gauge interest and get feedback in regards to what needs work, feel free to comment your thoughts. I will most likely be working in a group come the summer to flesh out the story and work on introducing enemies, levels, and lighting mechanics as well as other ideas I have had. I mainly just wanted to spend time nailing the atmosphere.

Installation:

  1. Download the Zip File
  2. Extract to a preferred location
  3. Run "The Grey House.exe"
